ygData.subject: That darn goblin alchemist.
ygData.msgSnippet: Started.. or at least tried to start.. the Treant Fists quest last night. It s 10:04AM central... I haven t gone to bed yet.  Spent from 1:15am until just now
ygData.messageBody:
Started.. or at least tried to start.. the Treant Fists quest last night.

It's 10:04AM central... I haven't gone to bed yet. Spent from 1:15am until
just now slaughtering goblins in Misty Thicket trying to get the damn
alchemist to spawn. No luck. Even petitioned just before the servers were
going to come down to see if they could make him spawn for me. No dice. :)

Ah well... I hope my next attempt later today won't last as long as this one
did. I'm exhausted.

Hopefully the servers will be up when I wake up.

- Raean Bloodyhands, 26th monk, Tunare.
